questions.description:
Given below are two statements : one is labelled as 
Assertion (A) and the other is labelled as Reason (R). 
Assertion (A) : Polymerase chain reaction is used in DNA amplification 
Reason (R) : The ampicllin resistant gene is used as a selectable marker to check transformation
 In the light of the above statements, choose the correct answer from the options given below :

options.description: (A) is correct but (R) is not correct
(A) is not correct but (R) is correct
Both (A) and (R) are correct and (R) is the correct explanation of (A)
Both (A) and (R) are correct but (R) is not the correct explanation of (A)

questions.description: ln the following palindromic base sequences of DNA which one can be cut easily by particular restriction enzyme?

Given below are two statements : 
Statement I: Restriction endonucleases recognise specific sequence to cut DNA known as palindromic nucleotide sequence. 
Statement II : Restriction endonucleases cut the DNA  strand a little away from the centre of the palindromic site. 
In the light of the above statements, choose the most 
appropriate answer from the options given below

options.description: Statement I is correct but Statement II is incorrect
Statement I is incorrect but Statement II is correct
Both Statement I and Statement Il are correct
Both Statement I and Statement II are incorrect

questions.description: Which of the following is not a desirable feature of a cloning vector?

questions.description:

In the light of the above statements, choose the correct  answer from the options given below

options.description: Both (A) and (R) are correct and (R) is the correct  explanation of (A)
Both (A) and R) are correct but (R) is not the Correct explanation of (A)
(A) is correct but (R) is not correct
(A) is not correct but (R) is correct
